## RTCClient.setAutoSubscribe() method

设置是否自动订阅

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAutoSubscribe(autoSubscribe: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  autoSubscribe | boolean | 是否自动订阅 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

默认开启自动订阅
